  1. uno.anahata.ai.context.provider
  2. ContextProvider

Uses of Class
uno.anahata.ai.context.provider.ContextProvider

Packages that use ContextProvider
Package
Description
uno.anahata.ai.config
Provides the core configuration framework for chat sessions.
uno.anahata.ai.context.provider
Defines the framework for dynamically injecting contextual information into the AI model's prompt.
uno.anahata.ai.context.provider.spi
This package contains a set of concrete implementations of the ContextProvider interface, each designed to inject a specific type of information into the system prompt, creating a rich and dynamic context for the AI.
uno.anahata.ai.swing.context.provider
Provides UI components for managing the conversation context providers.

    Description

    ContentFactory.processProvider(ContextProvider provider)

  • Uses of ContextProvider in uno.anahata.ai.context.provider.spi

    Subclasses of ContextProvider in uno.anahata.ai.context.provider.spi
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ChatStatusProvider
    A context provider that injects high-level information about the current chat session's state into the model's prompt.
    class 
    ContextSummaryProvider
    A critical context provider that injects a detailed, machine-readable summary of the entire conversation history into the model's prompt.
    class 
    CoreSystemInstructionsMdFileProvider
    A context provider that loads the core system instructions from a Markdown file in the classpath.
    class 
    EnvironmentVariablesProvider
    A context provider that injects the current system environment variables into the model's prompt.
    class 
    StatefulResourcesProvider
    A context provider that injects a table of all stateful resources (e.g., files) currently tracked in the conversation context.
    class 
    SystemPropertiesProvider
    A context provider that injects the current JVM system properties into the model's prompt.

  • Uses of ContextProvider in uno.anahata.ai.swing.context.provider

    Subclasses of ContextProvider in uno.anahata.ai.swing.context.provider
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ApplicationFramesContextProvider
    A ContextProvider that captures the screen and provides it as image parts.
